name: Harvard University
description: Harvard University, founded in 1636, is the oldest institution of higher learning in the United States and consistently ranked among the world’s top universities. It offers programs across law, medicine, business, sciences, and humanities.

name: Stanford University
description: Stanford University is a premier private research university in California’s Silicon Valley, known globally for its entrepreneurial environment and excellence in engineering, computer science, and business.

name: University of Michigan - Ann Arbor
description: The University of Michigan, located in Ann Arbor, is one of the oldest public universities in the U.S., known for its research strength, academic rigor, and large, vibrant campus life.

name: Cornell University
description: Cornell University, an Ivy League institution, combines a strong liberal arts core with world-class science and engineering programs, and is known for its diverse student body and beautiful upstate New York campus.

name: University of California - Berkeley
description: UC Berkeley is one of the world’s leading public universities, renowned for research excellence, progressive activism, and innovation in fields like computer science, economics, and engineering.

name: Massachusetts Institute of Technology (MIT)
description: MIT is a world-renowned university specializing in science, engineering, and technology. It is famous for its cutting-edge research and its close ties to entrepreneurship and industry.

name: Columbia University
description: Columbia University, an Ivy League school in Manhattan, is known for its strong programs in journalism, medicine, business, and law, and its global research initiatives.

name: University of Washington - Seattle
description: The University of Washington in Seattle is one of the nation’s top public research universities, especially recognized for its leadership in medicine, engineering, and computer science.

name: Johns Hopkins University
description: Johns Hopkins University, founded in 1876 in Baltimore, Maryland, is a world leader in research and higher education. It is especially renowned for its medical, public health, and international studies programs.

name: Yale University
description: Yale University, an Ivy League institution in New Haven, Connecticut, is one of the oldest and most prestigious universities in the U.S., known for its rigorous academics, historic campus, and strong alumni network.

name: University of California - Los Angeles (UCLA)
description: UCLA is one of the most prestigious public research universities in the U.S., offering top-ranked programs in engineering, film, business, and the sciences. Its vibrant Los Angeles campus reflects diversity and innovation.

name: University of Pennsylvania
description: The University of Pennsylvania, located in Philadelphia, is a historic Ivy League university known for its leadership in business, medicine, and law, and for integrating academic theory with real-world practice.

name: University of Wisconsin - Madison
description: UW-Madison is a flagship public university known for excellence in research, education, and outreach. It offers strong programs in engineering, agriculture, and public affairs, and boasts a lively student life.

name: University of Minnesota - Twin Cities
description: The University of Minnesota’s Twin Cities campus is one of the largest and most comprehensive public research universities in the country, excelling in science, engineering, public health, and education.

name: University of Chicago
description: The University of Chicago is a private research university known for its core curriculum and deep intellectual culture. It excels in economics, law, political science, and mathematics.

name: Pennsylvania State University
description: Penn State is a large public university system known for its research, athletics, and strong engineering and agricultural programs. Its main campus in University Park is the academic and cultural heart of the system.

name: New York University (NYU)
description: NYU is a private university in the heart of Manhattan, known for strong programs in law, arts, business, and social sciences, with a globally diverse student body and campuses abroad.

name: Ohio State University
description: The Ohio State University is one of the largest public universities in the U.S., with strengths in business, engineering, and health sciences, and a major NCAA athletic presence.

name: University of Illinois at Urbana-Champaign
description: UIUC is a top-tier public research university known for innovation in engineering, computer science, and library science. It has a large international student population and strong entrepreneurial culture.

name: University of California - San Diego
description: UC San Diego is a leading public research university recognized for excellence in science, oceanography, engineering, and public health. Its location and innovative spirit foster a strong startup culture.

name: Princeton University
description: Princeton University is a prestigious Ivy League research university known for its rigorous academics and beautiful campus in Princeton, New Jersey.

name: University of Southern California
description: USC is a major private research university in Los Angeles known for strong programs in film, business, and engineering.

name: University of Florida
description: A top-ranked public university known for research excellence, innovation, and strong athletic programs.

name: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
description: UNC-Chapel Hill is a top public university offering strong liberal arts and research-focused programs.

name: Northwestern University
description: A private research university known for journalism, law, business, and the arts.

name: University of Texas at Austin
description: UT Austin is a leading public research university known for academic strength and its vibrant city life.

name: Duke University
description: A prestigious private university known for its programs in medicine, law, and public policy.

name: University of California - Davis
description: UC Davis is a public university known for agriculture, veterinary medicine, and biological sciences.

name: Rutgers University - New Brunswick
description: Rutgers is the largest public university in New Jersey with strong programs in science and humanities.

name: University of Maryland - College Park
description: UMD is a public research university near Washington D.C. known for engineering and public policy.

name: Michigan State University
description: MSU is a top public university known for agriculture, education, and international studies.

name: Purdue University
description: Purdue is a leading engineering and STEM-focused university with a global research footprint.

name: University of Pittsburgh
description: A research-heavy public university with strengths in health sciences and humanities.

name: University of Arizona
description: A major public university recognized for environmental science, space studies, and engineering.

name: Texas A&M University - College Station
description: One of the largest universities in the U.S., known for engineering, agriculture, and military tradition.

name: Boston University
description: A large private university with strengths in communication, law, business, and international relations.

name: University of California - San Francisco
description: A graduate-level health sciences university known globally for research and medical education.

name: Carnegie Mellon University
description: CMU is a global leader in computer science, robotics, engineering, and the arts.

name: Washington University in St. Louis
description: WashU is a private research university known for strong programs in medicine, business, and social work.

name: University of Virginia
description: UVA is a top-ranked public institution founded by Thomas Jefferson, known for leadership, law, and public policy.

name: University of Utah
description: The University of Utah is a public research university in Salt Lake City known for medicine, business, and computer science.

name: University of California - Irvine
description: UC Irvine is a leading public university focused on science, medicine, and the arts.

name: Arizona State University - Tempe
description: ASU is one of the largest public universities, known for innovation and online programs.

name: University of Colorado Boulder
description: CU Boulder is a public research university recognized for aerospace, environmental, and engineering programs.

name: California Institute of Technology
description: Caltech is a world-renowned science and engineering institute with a low student-to-faculty ratio.

name: North Carolina State University at Raleigh
description: NC State is known for its strengths in STEM, textiles, and agricultural sciences.

name: Georgia Institute of Technology
description: Georgia Tech is a top-tier STEM-focused university known for engineering and technology leadership.

name: University of Iowa
description: UIowa is a major public research university famous for its Writers' Workshop and health sciences.

name: Brown University
description: Brown is an Ivy League university celebrated for its open curriculum and intellectual freedom.

name: Vanderbilt University
description: Vanderbilt is a private research university known for education, medicine, and law.

name: Emory University
description: Emory is a prestigious university with strong programs in health sciences, law, and business.

name: University of California - Santa Barbara
description: UCSB is a public research university recognized for engineering, physics, and marine sciences.

name: University of Georgia
description: UGA is a flagship public university known for agriculture, business, and journalism.

name: University of Rochester
description: A private research university known for its strong programs in optics, music, and medicine.

name: Georgetown University
description: Georgetown is a globally ranked university known for law, foreign service, and public policy.

name: Iowa State University
description: ISU is a public university with strong programs in agriculture, engineering, and design.

name: Tufts University
description: Tufts is a private research university known for international relations and medicine.

name: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University
description: Virginia Tech is a public university with a focus on engineering, architecture, and applied sciences.

name: University of Miami
description: The University of Miami is a private research university known for medicine, business, and marine science.

name: University of Illinois at Chicago
description: UIC is a diverse public university known for health sciences, architecture, and urban research.

name: University of Kentucky
description: The University of Kentucky is a public research university offering a wide array of academic programs. Known for its focus on agriculture, health, and engineering, UK serves a diverse student body across undergraduate and graduate programs.

name: University of Massachusetts - Amherst
description: UMass Amherst is the flagship campus of the University of Massachusetts system. It is a leading public research university that emphasizes innovation and community engagement across disciplines.

name: Oregon State University
description: Oregon State University is a public research university known for its programs in engineering, forestry, and marine sciences. It has a strong commitment to sustainability and outreach across Oregon.

name: Colorado State University - Fort Collins
description: Colorado State University is a land-grant university with nationally recognized programs in veterinary medicine, agriculture, and sustainability. It is located in the scenic city of Fort Collins.

name: George Washington University
description: George Washington University is a private research university located in the heart of Washington, D.C. It offers prestigious programs in law, international affairs, and political science.

name: Indiana University - Bloomington
description: Indiana University Bloomington is the flagship campus of Indiana University, offering a wide range of undergraduate and graduate programs.

name: University of New Mexico
description: The University of New Mexico is a public research university known for its programs in engineering, law, and medicine.

name: University of California - Santa Cruz
description: UC Santa Cruz is a public university in the University of California system known for its progressive teaching methods and natural sciences.

name: University of Houston
description: The University of Houston is a major public research university offering programs in law, business, and engineering.

name: University of Alabama at Birmingham
description: UAB is a comprehensive urban university and a major center for clinical research and health care.

name: Rice University
description: Rice University is a top-tier research university known for its strong programs in science, engineering, and business.

name: University of California - Riverside
description: UC Riverside is part of the University of California system and is known for its diversity and research in environmental sciences.

name: University of South Carolina - Columbia
description: The University of South Carolina is a public research university known for its business, engineering, and public health programs.

name: Brigham Young University - Provo
description: BYU is a private university sponsored by the LDS Church and is recognized for its emphasis on undergraduate education and values.

name: University of Delaware
description: The University of Delaware is a public land-grant university known for chemical engineering, business, and education.
